Aarvy Technologies specialize in Static website design and development. As a pioneering static web design agency based in Delhi, we render dynamic solutions that become an asset to your business.

Our team of designing experts combine technical acumen with innovation for quality deliverables. Whether its aesthetics or functionality, you can rely on us for an end product that takes your business to an all new level.

A static site is ten times faster than a dynamic site that is built with a CMS. Another reason for a static website to run faster is that it can be served from the node closest to the Aarvy Technolgy is one of the top Codeigniter development company in India. We have developed many Websites on Codeigniter MVC framework. Aarvy Technolgy team members are young and well trained, so we always keep update ourselves with latest versions of Codeigniter, therefore we are producing the beneficial result to our extreme clients.
CodeIgniter is an Open source web application framework for utilize in creating dynamic web sites with PHP. It’s a powerful PHP framework, which allows a simple and elegant toolkit, to build a full- featured dynamic web application for the PHP developers. CodeIgniter is entirely based on the popular model view controller development model.Codeigniter is a lightweight web application frame written in PHP that accepts the model-view-controller approach to development. Codeigniter is based on model view controller (MVC) architecture is well-suited with standard shared hosting accounts.

Shopify helps various business professionals to set up and run an online store directly. Shopify is the best option for all small online businesses. Shopify is the most powerful e-commerce platform. With the help of Shopify, you can run your e-commerce store in a short span of time. Aarvy Technology’s custom software development is inclusive of a wide array of solutions. Over the years we have rendered a whole spectrum of bespoke software development solutions to variegated industries across the orb.

Our team of experienced and innovative software developers ensure accelerated and yet efficient software products suited for your unique business objectives. With best practices and execution methods in place backed by a state of the art infrastructure, we guarantee seamless deliveries.

Simplify online transactions by virtue of our end to end payment gateway integration solutions. Aarvy Technology offers online merchants and ecommerce businesses simplified yet highly efficient payment gateway integration services. Our payment integration services empower you with choices galore when it comes to payment options.

Website maintenance is a pre-requisite for a business to harness a vibrant and interminable online presence. Periodically updated relevant content keeps the website visitors hooked and thus it helps in maintaining a good flow of traffic to the website. Your website has to be scanned regularly for bugs and also checked whether the pages are efficiently working or not.
